go_data.justification: MURF was contained in the microtubule pellet from muscle extracts and was absent from the supernatant, demonstrating a physical association between MURF and microtubules in vivo.
Expression of MURF is required for skeletal myoblast differentiation and myotube fusion.
MURF stabilizes microtubules and is essential for the initiation of myogenesis and myotube formation.
MURF associates with microtubules in skeletal muscle cells.
